title: PET FAIR VIETNAM 2026
description:
Join Us for Petfair Vietnam 2026 Now ! 
 Prepare for the largest and most influential pet industry exhibition in Vietnam to date! Spanning over 5,000 m² of exhibition space, Petfair Vietnam 2026 will host more than 250 leading exhibitors from 20 countries and territories, and we are expecting an attendance of over 12,000 industry professionals, buyers, and pet enthusiasts from across the world.

title: InterPetFest 2026
description:
Join Us for Petfair Vietnam 2026 Now ! 
 Prepare for the largest and most influential pet industry exhibition in Vietnam to date! Spanning over 5,000 m² of exhibition space, Petfair Vietnam 2026 will host more than 250 leading exhibitors from 20 countries and territories, and we are expecting an attendance of over 12,000 industry professionals, buyers, and pet enthusiasts from across the world.

title: Vietnam Pet Festival 2025
description:
InterPetFest is the  pet-dedicated show in Vietnam, including an international B2B expo (InterPet Expo Vietnam on the first day) and a B2C festival (PetFest Vietnam on the second and third days)
 InterPet Expo Vietnam is expecting to welcome approximately 3,000 trade buyers and business visitors. PetFest Vietnam is the pet-friendly event at the Saigon Exhibition and Convention Center (SECC), expecting to welcome approximately 10,000 consumer visitors with their pets.
